mapper.insert: insert into sv_user (mobile_phone, user_name, password, create_time) values (#{mobilePhone}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: select * from sv_user where mobile_phone = #{user.mobilePhone} and password = #{user.password};
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_name, mobile_phone) values(#{user.id}, #{user.userName}, #{user.mobilePhone});
mapper.update: update sv_user set password = #{user.password} where mobile_phone = #{user.mobilePhone};
mapper.select: select count(*) from attention_info where user_id = #{userId} and fans_id = #{fansId};
